query: SELECT s.id, s.title, COUNT(et.id) as evidence_count FROM standards s LEFT JOIN evidenceTemplates et ON s.id = et.standardId GROUP BY s.id, s.title ORDER BY s.orderIndex
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YLZPes1ubcofMz.root --database PdwWnVF2DAatRAKFwvgWXk --execute SELECT s.id, s.title, COUNT(et.id) as evidence_count FROM standards s LEFT JOIN evidenceTemplates et ON s.id = et.standardId GROUP BY s.id, s.title ORDER BY s.orderIndex
